Text: This is supposed to be really good.

EXCELLENT.
Thank you for the encode/upload 20-40.
I've been waiting for this one.

Will wait a little longer though as I see you are still the only seed and don't want to slow anything down.

@ ALL downloaders: This is a 10 part series so please don't be assholes. SEED!

Cheers
Jon

Its ok to join the initial swarm - Just seed to AT LEAST a ratio of 1:1. And its also better if you can upload fast (not sure what is considered fast because if you're from japan 100mbps upload is only normal!)

Thanks guys. Small-encoding was actually done more than a day before this one, but I was thinking "Why in hell are XviD episodes 525 MB?" Having one season on 1 and 1/2 DVD-R somehow bothers me, always did... in fact.
I encoded episode for myself, tweaked video and audio and... decided to up this one first.
In my opinion, quality is sensational, but my small-sized version would be upped sometime today (it's busiest day in my schedule).
Well, as I said before I hope that someone find this file-size useful, because "The Pacific" is definitely a "keeper", for times to come.

@jjabrams:  Regarding initial-seeding anyone who has at least 50 kB/s upload speed could join to initial-swarm. Members of initial-swarm must not care about ratios, speeds and such crap, they should be generous people with fast connections - that's all...
And do you know how many of them comes here? 22, someday 27... and 10000 morons who jump-in in initial-seeding and clog and choke and screw up not just me but anybody else.

Regarding Japan, I am on-line from 1998 - 24/7... and I have never seen really fast Jap, not even "disguised" one, never. In matter of  torrents, of course.
Just started watching this and I had to come back and tell you WOW...well done.
Awesome loved the episode...but for me at least it doesnt play in itunes, and thus wont play on my itouch or iphone...audio works fine but video is black
